description: softcover book with green cover; title and artist's name in horizontally segmented box, with intentionally blacked out text at C; pixelated photographic reproductions of images of people and buildings inside on orange and green paper; also simple geometric drawings and crossed out text; bound volume; lender's archive #36
image_copyright: © David Tremlett %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on first page: [For Bill │ David Tremlett │ 2005--]
title: How Far in That Direction
